Function reference

All functions

LRdb_human
Ligand-receptor database (human)
LRdb_mouse
Ligand-receptor database (mouse)
add_spatial_ccc_graph_metrics()
Add various graph metrics to spatial CCC graph
add_spatial_ccc_graph_metrics_to_edges()
Copy graph metrics from nodes to edges
add_spatial_data()
Add spatial data to CCC table
amend_ccc_table_with_cell_annots()
Amend CCC table with annotations for source and destination cells
barebone_spatial_ccc_graph()
Create barebone CCC graph
calc_spot_dist()
Calculate distance between spots
calc_spot_dist0()
Calculate distance between spots
collapse_to_ccc_by_cell()
Aggregate ccc_by_cell_lr to cells
compute_spatial_ccc()
Compute ligand-receptor interactions
dist_cell_overlap_ccc_tbl()
Compute cell overlap distance
dist_cell_overlap_edgesets() lf_cell_overlap_edgesets()
Compute distance between LRs
extract_ccc_graph_metrics()
Extract spatial CCC graph metrics
geom_spatial()
A ggplot2 layer for visualizing the Visium histology
get_LRdb() get_LRdb_small()
Return LRdb table
get_spatial_data()
Get spatial coordinates
lf_cell_overlap_ccc_tbl()
Compute cell overlap distance
lf_to_dist()
Convert distance in long format to matrix
modify_alpha_image()
Modify image with alpha
plot_spatial_ccc_graph()
Plot spatial CCC graph
plot_spatial_feature()
Plot spatial feature
prep_cell_overlap_ccc_tbl()
Prepare CCC table for distance calcuation
set_ccc_table_default_cluster()
Set default cluster in CCC table
summarise_ccc_by_cell_lr()
Summarize CCC table by (cell, LR)
summarize_ccc_graph_metrics()
Summarize spatial CCC graph list to table
tag_cells_in_ccc_graph()
Tag nodes if included in COIs
tidy_up_ccc_graph()
Tidy up CCC graph by removing isolated nodes
to_barebone_spatial_ccc_graph()
Convert CCC table to barebone spatial CCC graph
to_spatial_ccc_graph()
Convert CCC table to spatial CCC graph
to_spatial_ccc_graph_list()
Convert a list of CCC tables to a list of spatial CCC graphs
